programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A Cold War Soviet classic goes under the hammer. Built like a tank, the Moskovitch gets few admirers for style, but finds a loving home with a fan of Eastern Bloc classics.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Three MGs from the 70s turn up at the garage, still covered in original factory wax. Nobody can believe it, or value them. A Morris 1000 turns up at the auction along with a TR7 V8.

programme.title: Secrets of the Third Reich
programme.sub-title: Secrets of the Third Reich: The Nazi Gold Train
programme.desc: Part one of two. The search for a missing train containing Nazi treasure, which was believed to have been hidden in the mountains of Poland.

programme.title: A Tale of Two Sisters
programme.desc: Jackie Kennedy's relationship with her sister Lee, which was a source of support in the wake of her husband's death but fell apart after her second marriage.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Press Preview
programme.desc: A preview of the stories appearing in tomorrow's national newspapers.

programme.title: Piers Morgan's Life Stories
programme.desc: Actor Warwick Davis talks to Piers about his life and career, which includes supporting roles in both the Harry Potter and Star Wars films. The actor and presenter opens up about the struggles he and his wife Sam faced when starting a family and offers an entertaining and revealing account of some of the routine realities of life as a little person, including the challenges of supermarket shopping and airline travel. He also reflects on his leading roles alongside Jennifer Aniston, Val Kilmer and Ricky Gervais, and talks about his work to support other people with dwarfism.

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: 1000 Heartbeats
programme.desc: Vernon Kay hosts the quiz show in which contestants' pulses are monitored and they must complete seven rounds before their hearts beat 1,000 times to win Â£25,000 - meaning they will have to stay calm under pressure or risk losing the jackpot.

programme.title: ITV Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service.

programme.title: Just Dance! Friday Night Party
programme.desc: We're embracing our inner Lady Gaga and getting ready to dance our Friday night away with the ultimate party anthems.

programme.title: Late Night Magic
programme.desc: We're taking you all the way through the night with soem of the best tracks of all time.

programme.title: Kisstory: Old Skool & Anthems
programme.desc: It's time to go back in time with KISSTORY! The biggest old skool anthems ever from your favourite artists.

programme.title: Up All Night! Kiss Beats
programme.desc: Let the world sleep! But here at Kiss we are still up, still delivering the finest beats for your nocturnal jam.

programme.title: Chart Hits & New Vids
programme.desc: We've got all the hits that are storming the charts right now, along with some brand new releases from your favourite and new artists.

programme.title: All The Hits, All Night
programme.desc: Non-stop hits to see you all the way through the night.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: A look at how waste is collected in Venice, how Australia's famous sheepskin boots are made, and how pond algae is turned into a health supplement.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer purchases a Mini Moke, which was designed as an off-road military vehicle, for expert mechanic Edd China to work on - before trying to sell it for a profit.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: A junkyard wizard has an Oktoberfest gem with Frank Fritz's name written all over it.

programme.title: American Chopper
programme.desc: After winning the Favourite Wish-Maker Award, the team decides to build a special bike for the children of the Make-a-Wish Foundation.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: John Ponts struggles to maintain control when he encounters turbulence. The pilots are left in charge of the terminal, and Sarah's rescue mission turns into a battle for survival.

programme.title: Dirty Jobs
programme.desc: Mike Rowe takes on a succession of unpleasant tasks, this time learning how to make maple syrup.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: How lacrosse sticks, frozen food, torches and paintbrushes are produced, and the way they have evolved with changes in technology.

programme.title: How It's Made
programme.desc: The manufacture of deep-cycle batteries, tins and optical lenses.

programme.title: My Murder Story
programme.desc: A series of mysterious deaths have plagued a small community in Kansas. The thorough investigation of one determined detective reveals a sinister secret..

programme.title: Forensic Detectives
programme.desc: A man risks everything in the hunt for his sister's killer, and a sexual predator is getting away with his crimes.

programme.title: Murder on CCTV
programme.desc: The case of Louisiana student Mickey Shunick, who went missing after a night out in May 2012. Police failed to make a breakthrough until they spoted her on surveillance footage. Eventually a registered sex offender pleaded guilty to killing the 21-year-old, and also being responsible for the death of another woman whose body had been found in September 1999.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: The case of 62-year-old Narleen Campton, who was found murdered in her home, apparently having been tortured, during Thanksgiving 2011 in Newport, Washington. Though Jeremy Bryant confessed to his involvement, doubt remains over whether he acted alone.

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: The investigation into the murder of New Jersey state trooper Phillip Lamanco, whose killers were connected to terrorism.

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: Agents recall memorable cases, including the seizure of more than 30 poodles, 200 chickens being kept in inhumane temperatures exceeding 100 degrees and a house overrun by 50 rabbits.

programme.title: Bondi Vet
programme.desc: Dr Lisa is tasked with saving a five-year-old's paralysed dachshund, while Dr Chris is presented with a list by another little girl.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: Lori's team tries to keep sibling rivalry in check between two sisters getting married within 30 days of each other. Plus, a country bride tries to control her bridesmaids.
